subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|木|目|ls=ic|t1=tree|t2=eye}} – looking at, or watching the tree.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
An [[allofam]] is {{och-l|胥|each other; mutually; all; to observe; to assist}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

Derivative: {{och-l|想|to think}} (“appearance > to visualise > to think”).

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[look]] at; to [[examine]] the [[appearance]] and [[judge]]; to [[observe]]
# [[looks]]; [[appearance]]; [[feature]]s
# [[posture]]; [[carriage]]; [[bearing]]
# [[photo]]; [[picture]]; [[photograph]] {{zh-mw|c:張}}
#: {{zh-x|影 幾 張 相|to take a few '''pictures'''|C}}
# [[phase]]; [[exterior]]; [[stage]]; [[period]]
# {{lb|zh|physics}} [[phase]]
# {{lb|zh|geology}} [[facies]]
# to [[physiognomise]]; to [[practise]] [[physiognomy]]; to [[tell]] [[fortune]] by [[read]]ing the subject's [[facial]] [[feature]]s
# [[physiognomy]]; [[practice]] of physiognomy
# to [[choose]]; to [[pick]]
# to [[assist]]; to [[help]]; to [[oversee]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[prime minister]]; [[minister]]
#* {{zh-x|恩 相，恰 纔 蒙 兩 個 承 局 呼喚 林沖，將 刀 來 比 看。|Benevolent '''Lord''', two of your lieutenants brought me here saying you wanted to compare your sword with mine.|ref={{w|Water Margin}}, [[:wikisource:zh:水滸傳 (120回本)/第007回|Chapter 7]]}}
# {{lb|zh|Chinese chess}} [[minister]] (on the red side)
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[master]] of [[ceremonies]]
# {{lb|zh|historical}} [[attendant]]
# to [[administer]]; to [[govern]]
# to [[teach]]; to [[instruct]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
